## Up/down arrows

- Navigate the command history
- &#8593; older commands
- &#8595; newer commands

No need to re-write older commands!

## Search

- **Ctrl + R** - reverse search for previous commands

![](img/search.PNG){width=400}

Use Ctrl + R again to get to the next search result
